hypothesis_content.title: ETH/BTC Ratio Compression Before Liquidity Return
hypothesis_content.statement: During NEUTRAL regimes when BTC dominance rises >2% in 3 days while total crypto market cap stagnates (±1%), the ETH/BTC ratio will compress to 0.0335-0.0340 support. When BTC dominance then reverses with increasing total market cap, ETH outperforms BTC by 1.5-2x on the rebound as liquidity rotates from safety (BTC) to beta (ETH).
hypothesis_content.rationale: In uncertain periods (budget crisis, liquidity questions), money flows to BTC as 'safe haven' within crypto. When macro uncertainty eases or crypto-specific sentiment improves, liquidity rotates to higher-beta ETH. The compression to 0.0335-0.0340 represents extreme risk-off positioning that reverses when conditions stabilize.
entry_conditions: Total crypto market cap change within ±1% over same period
BTC dominance 4-hour chart shows bearish divergence (price higher highs, RSI lower highs)

exit_conditions.take_profit: ETH/BTC ratio reaches 0.0350 OR BTC dominance drops below start of 72-hour period

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: ETH/BTC breaks 0.0330 and continues downward while BTC dominance continues rising >4% total.
